message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.SI. 

This paper discusses the impact of fair machine learning on representation disparity and group retention in a sequential decision-making setting. The paper focuses on the long-term effects of fairness criteria on the evolution of group representation over time. Given the focus on machine learning and fairness, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CY (Computers and Society), cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
